Since Finizen is the better swimmer, _____ will approach it under the cover of seaweed, then immobilize it with a poisonous attack.
Using a liquid poison, _____ indiscriminately attacks anything that wanders into its territory. This poison can corrode the undersides of boats.
_____ generates dragon energy by sticking the plume on its head out above the ocean’s surface and bathing it in sunlight.
_____ uses a poisonous liquid capable of corroding metal to send tankers that enter its territory to the bottom of the sea.
It blends in with seaweed to ambush its prey and then takes them down with a poisonous liquid strong enough to melt metal.
This vicious Pokémon sprays a poisonous liquid on opponents that come near. For whatever reason, it gets along really well with Dhelmise.
Tales are told of ships that wander into seas where _____ live, never to return.
Their poison is strong enough to eat through the hull of a tanker, and they spit it indiscriminately at anything that enters their territory.
